title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

If someone hates America, it's a safe bet they have left-leaning political views. ESPN Rachel Nichols-Maria Taylor kerfuffle shows that elites don't want to live by their own woke rules. Rush's Timeless Wisdom: The American flag is a trigger to those on the left. C&B invite everyone to go out and enjoy being an American.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
